name: Little Man's Wonderland
description:
Explore the world of your backyard by imagining ordinary objects as extraordinary tools! But sometimes, you have to imagine bigger... A 2D "adventure" game

---------------------------------------------------

This was the first game I ever made along with: Sam Reid, Keith Rice, Amanda Smith, and Carter Smith.

This was created in 48 hours at Global Game Jam 2014 in Atlanta, GA using Game Maker. You can find the original submission here.

The prompt was "We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are."

I hope you enjoy our game :)
